about_the_game:
Alex is the new guy at the box warehouse, ending the day with a company dance party, but that night something goes horribly wrong! You and Alex defend against the zombie hoard by building walls of boxes from factories, with help from your rag-tag group of survivors.

Fight your way through the levels as you save survivors and upgrade your factories and conveyor belts, choose your skill tree upgrade path, and explore the story of the corruption of Norwick as you save people from the zombies taking over.

Crisp controls, isometric graphics, off-beat humor with a good story, and one-of-a-kind gameplay makes this an indie title not to miss.

This demo includes the first 8 levels of 56 levels, for free!

content_descriptors.notes: Visible blood spray and acts of self defense using boxes as shields.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTS 450 / AMD Radeon HD 5570
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device

Recommended:

short_description: Survive the undead onslaught in Zombactory! Build factories, conveyor belts, and face all types of zombies as you build walls to defend your crew. Uncover an epic story and save the neighborhood.
